thread.section_title: ezCater Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ezCater | www.ezcater.com
thread.title: Whitney James

author: Whitney James
title: Whitney James
text: I have always had horrible trouble with caters. Considering I order food for my office 2+ times a week this is a big issue for me. I cannot be happier that I found ezcater! I have never had a missed delivery and if there is ever an issue ezcater has notified me immediately and already had alternatives and suggestions ready to go. It has made my life so much easier!
